name: 60 Second Super Hero
description:
This game was designed and developed in eighteen hours by a collaborative team at the Marshall University Game Jam 2018.  

In this game you play as a young boy named Timmy! Timmy wants to go outside and have a fantastic adventure! However, rain is coming, and you need to get outside before it arrives! 

Run, jump, and collect the correct items to get outside and become the hero of your dreams!

The superhero endings are determined by the three items you pick up.  Can you get all five heroic endings?
